description: Removal of Condition 10 (BREEAM) of planning permission 14/02368/FUL (Demolition of existing garages and a single storey extension with the erection of a two storey building to provide 2 self-contained residential units. Removal of existing extension to the existing dwelling house, alterations to existing windows and doors, with the provision of cycle storage and refuse storage) granted 30.09.2014Condition 10 states:The dwellings hereby permitted shall achieve a minimum of Level 3 of the BREEAM Code for Sustainable Homes or subsequent superseding equivalent BREEAM scheme.  No dwelling shall be occupied until a final Code Certificate has been issued for it certifying that Code Level 3 has been achieved.
